name: Unfinished - An Artist's Lament
description: A hand-drawn 3D adventure game. Help unfinished drawing Sketch realize who he was meant to be as he chases after the artist's pencil, in a story of self-discovery of the art and his artist told in parallel. Featuring 2D character animation in a 3D environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 or later, 32-bit or 64-bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 Storage: 800 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Poignant story and a very creative style. The voice over and melancholy story unfolding as you play makes for a uniquely peaceful experience that draws you in. I connected more with the invisible voice than my stick-figure avatar. Even as a non-artist it was enjoyable.   Trickly controls with a strange ability toggle system, and occaisonal trouble detecting white on white edges of things were only minor problems.
